enhanced_by.reason: Parameter validation is required before creating a code to ensure the parameters are correct.

enhanced_by.method_name: RequestHandler.sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The request handler must be initialized and ready to send requests before creating a code.
Both methods involve handling and processing of gift card codes, which can inform the assertions for createCode.
The verify method checks the validity of a gift card code, which can be used to assert the correctness of the code created by createCode.
